fullText: If/Then is a show that wants to have it both ways: to be both a serious meditation on choice and consequence and a feel-good musical about following your dreams.
dtliExcerpt: If/Then is a show that wants to have it both ways: to be both a serious meditation on choice and consequence and a feel-good musical about following your dreams.
bwwExcerpt: If/Then surely answers all those needs. You absolutely never know what is going to happen, right up to the last, surprisingly moving beat. You appreciate its addressing the central dilemma of career vs. family in a very direct way and then, quietly but completely, undermining it in the end....
showScoreExcerpt: If/Then is a show that wants to have it both ways: to be both a serious meditation on choice and consequence and a feel-good musical about following your dreams.
